Rulings.HAT:
● Any Lingering Effects already applied to that target (EG "Shrink") are not removed from it.
If this card applies to a monster already affected by Shrink, its ATK is half its original, minus 800.
● If that target has less than 800 ATK, its ATK becomes 0, and it's still unaffected by S/Ts.

Rulings.Base:
1. This card targets 1 face-up monster on the field.
2. You can activate this card during the Damage Step, before damage calculation.
3. If the monster you target has less than 800 ATK, its ATK becomes 0 and it will be unaffected by the effects of other Spell/Trap Cards.
4. "Embodiment of Apophis" will be unaffected by "Trap Stun" and similar cards while it is affected by "Forbidden Lance".
5. If you use "Forbidden Lance" on a monster being affected by "Shrink", the ATK will be the halved original value minus 800.
